welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tracy, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport houses all of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport is used for private and charter flights, and offers a luxurious lounge for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is responsible for handling all freight and mail shipments.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
